name: Requested Ratings
description: A mod that replaces unrated levels' ratings with their requested ones.

enable-auto.name: Enable Auto
enable-auto.description: Enables the auto difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 1 star.

enable-easy.name: Enable Easy
enable-easy.description: Enables the easy difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 2 stars.

enable-normal.name: Enable Normal
enable-normal.description: Enables the normal difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 3 stars.

enable-hard.name: Enable Hard
enable-hard.description: Enables the hard difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 4 or 5 stars.

enable-harder.name: Enable Harder
enable-harder.description: Enables the harder difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 6 or 7 stars.

enable-insane.name: Enable Insane
enable-insane.description: Enables the insane difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 8 or 9 stars.

enable-demon.name: Enable Demon
enable-demon.description: Enables the demon difficulty for levels with a requested rating of 10 stars.

na-override.name: NA Override
na-override.description: Changes the rating of levels with a requested rating above 10 stars to NA.
